title: JAM 2021: Development
short_description: Are you a college or university student, eager to learn from staff who work to generate funding that supports all museum programs and operations?
header_description: Learn from staff who work to generate funding that supports all museum programs and operations.
list_description: Are you a college or university student, eager to learn from staff who work to generate funding that supports all museum programs and operations?
description:
Speakers:

Madeline Shearer, Assistant Director, Institutional Relations
Erika Lowe Mullins, Director, Philanthropy
Sam White, Coordinator, Philanthropy
Court Tan, Associate Director, Leadership Giving and Special Events

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students; registration required
